mapper.select: SELECT WH.WAREHOUSE_CD, WH.WAREHOUSE_NM, CC.COMMON_NM WAREHOUSE_TP, WH.WAREHOUSE_IN, WH.WAREHOUSE_RM, WH.WAREHOUSE_US FROM WAREHOUSE WH LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.COMMON_GC ='WHTYPE' AND CC.COMMON_CC = WH.WAREHOUSE_TP WHERE 1 = 1 AND WH.WAREHOUSE_CD LIKE '%${filter.warehouse_cd}%' AND WH.WAREHOUSE_NM LIKE '%${filter.warehouse_nm}%' AND WH.WAREHOUSE_TP = #{filter.warehouse_tp} AND WH.WAREHOUSE_US = #{filter.warehouse_us} ORDER BY WH.WAREHOUSE_IN
